home.heroSubtitle: Share your recipes, create variations, and track your cooking journey. Join a community of home cooks discovering new flavors together.
home.shareRecipesDesc: Create and share your favorite recipes with photos and step-by-step instructions.
home.createVariationsDesc: Put your own spin on recipes and see how dishes evolve across the community.
home.trackCookingDesc: Log your cooking sessions, note what worked, and improve over time.
home.startJourneyDesc: Download the app and join thousands of home cooks sharing their culinary adventures.

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.subtitle: Discover recipes from our community of home cooks

logs.title: Cooking Logs
logs.subtitle: See what others are cooking and their experiences
logs.beFirst: Be the first to share your cooking experience!
logs.shareExperience: Share your cooking experience with others

auth.signInDescription: Sign in to create recipes, log your cooking, and save your favorites.
auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to share recipes and track your cooking journey
auth.termsAgree: By signing in, you agree to our

search.title: Search
search.placeholder: Search for recipes, ingredients, or users...

errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
